title: Kha Ulti?
body: Khas ult active ( invis ) is 1.5 seconds long not long enough to do anything with to be honest. Rengars ult invis last approx. 190 years. Enough time to do anything he wants to do. Maybe increase Khas R from 1.5 seconds to 2.5 or 3 seconds even? Any thoughts?

replies.body: Kha'Zix cannot be seen or revealed (unless true sight is on him) while he's ulted. Rengar gets revealed by control wards and being too close to another enemy champion, not to mention the closest enemy champ is alerted to his presence. Hence, why Rengar's stealth lasts much longer than Kha'Zix's.

an assassin main (Khazix Mainly) and i say no to the increase of stealth time, but i would like to get more than 2 cast of his stealth ult again, because right now just running in a bush out of combat only works on the first attack after that very pointless, also it would bring in every adc main back to scream for him to get Nerf to the ground again because quote on quote, no counterplay to khazix, but vayne ez and urgot, now zoe are completely fine to be busted, which Vayne have a longer stealth time than khazix ult does, Ez does almost 300-400 lv 1 damage, and urgot is an unkillable machine. 

However he need a bit love i do say to bring him a bit up after the effect of losing leth runes.
